title: victim-target
description: The Victim Target object describes the target of an attack.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `victim-target`.

name.description: The name of this Victim Target.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Victim Target.

classification.description: The type of entity that this Source describes, e.g. an individual, organization. Open Vocab - identity-classification-ov

roles.description: The list of roles that this Victim Target performs.

sectors.description: The list of sectors that the Victim Target of the attack belongs to. Open Vocab - industry-sector-ov

regions.description: The list of regions (localities, nationalities) for this Victim Target.
